long_description: A premier sport climbing wiregate 'biner, the Black Diamond LiveWire Carabiner features a sculpted, hot-forged design and the snag-free, key lock benefits of HoodWire Technology. Thanks to a simple metal wire on the carabiner's nose, the LiveWire delivers the benefits of a key lock 'biner in a wiregate design. Nose won't snag on slings or bolt hangers when you're going for a clip. Forged ribs along the spine make for quick and secure thumb clipping, and the draw-friendly surface keeps the 'biner properly oriented.
short_description: A premier sport climbing wiregate 'biner, the Black Diamond LiveWire Carabiner features a sculpted, hot-forged design and the snag-free, key lock benefits of HoodWire Technology.
